meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spooky.
meanings.sent1: The spookinesses of the haunted house made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I felt a sense of spookinesses while walking through the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The spookinesses of the ghost story kept me on edge.
meanings.sent4: The spookinesses of the old cemetery lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The spookinesses of the abandoned mansion were palpable.

meanings.definition: The feeling of fear or unease caused by something eerie or supernatural.
meanings.sent1: Her eyes widened in spookinesses as she heard a strange noise.
meanings.sent2: A sense of spookinesses crept up my spine as I entered the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent3: The spookinesses of the horror movie made us jump in our seats.
meanings.sent4: The spookinesses of the foggy night added an eerie atmosphere to the scene.
meanings.sent5: The spookinesses of the unknown sent chills down my back.
